Author: katarina-stratford
Text: You can get long sleeve swim shirts. I believe some companies make legging type swim pant-things too, you could wear  swim shorts over them if your not down with just leggings.

Author: blvberi
Text: i would say your best call is to tell a school counselor about the body image thing- not self harm and not exactly about your ed, but if you explained that you’re uncomfortable because you’d be uncomfortable showing your body and your counselor could then speak with your other teacher. it’s valid reasoning and i don’t see anyone raising much suspicion to anything else.
